page.title: 05TONMAWR - EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Although all the collieries in the immediate vicinity of the village have closed, mining is still a major source of employment in Tonmawr.. both National Coal Board pits and private mines. Other employment sources are British Steel Corporation, British Petroleum and Metal Box Manufacturing Co. Within the village itself the main employer is The Creamline Bus Company ; there is garage which services vehicles - a family business which employs 1 or 2 apprentices; the non-teaching staff in the school are all from the village; there is a Mountain Centre which employs people from the village. The farms in the area tend to be small and run by the families that own them.
